author: Harlem World Magazine
title: 5 Ways The Right Refrigerator Can Save You Money
text:
Replacing your old refrigerator with an efficient model is one of the quickest ways to reduce energy costs. Major strides have been made in refrigerator efficiency over the decades.
Choose fridges with ENERGY STAR ratings that meet strict energy-efficiency guidelines. Keep your refrigerator running efficiently by regularly cleaning coils and checking seals.
Energy Efficiency
Energy-efficient refrigerators like
[Samsun](blank) g can save you money by reducing your electricity bills. They also help reduce greenhouse gas emissions, which is great for the planet and your family‚Äôs health. If you‚Äôre thinking about buying a new fridge, check out Energy Star‚Äôs best picks for energy-efficient models. These appliances meet strict energy consumption standards set by the Department of Energy. They also offer great savings compared to older models that were less efficient. You can also improve your appliance‚Äôs efficiency by adjusting its location. Avoid placing it in direct sunlight, next to the oven or dishwasher, or anywhere else where the air may be warmer than it should be. It‚Äôs also helpful to vacuum the refrigerator coils several times a year to keep them clean and working efficiently.
Another benefit of energy-efficient refrigerators is that they require fewer maintenance services and repairs than traditional models. This can save you time, money, and hassles like food spoiling while you wait for a repairperson to visit your home. In addition, they tend to last longer than standard refrigerators, which can further reduce your long-term costs. Some governments even offer incentives like rebates and tax reductions for people who buy energy-efficient fridges. The initial investment can pay for itself within a few years thanks to the yearly electricity cost savings.
Convenience
One of the biggest benefits of owning a refrigerator is that it can help you save money in the long run. For example, a fridge allows you to store food and beverages for longer periods, which can reduce waste by letting you enjoy fresher items before they spoil. Refrigerators are also more energy efficient than ever before, which can save you on electricity costs.
While it‚Äôs important to remember that even energy-efficient appliances consume a significant amount of electricity, it‚Äôs also good to look for further ways to reduce your usage. The most obvious way to do this is to turn off your fridge when you‚Äôre not using it. While the insulation of modern fridges is strong enough not to let the contents warm up too much while it‚Äôs turned off, you can further cut down on power consumption by keeping the door shut as much as possible.
Another way to reduce electricity usage is to choose a model that matches your family‚Äôs storage needs. You don‚Äôt want to purchase a fridge with more capacity than you need, which will cost you extra monthly electricity costs. Instead, prioritize must-have qualities like icemakers, humidity-controlled drawers and adjustable shelves before you go overboard on gimmicks like built-in K-Cup dispensers or smart features that sync up to your home Wi-Fi.
Style
Refrigerators consume significant household energy, so choosing an efficient model can help you reduce your electricity bills. The good news is that fridges have come a long way in terms of efficiency in recent years. By shopping for a refrigerator that is ENERGY STAR certified, you can be sure that you are getting the most out of your appliance.
Having the right refrigerator for your home can save you money on food costs. For example, if you cook many meals from scratch, consider investing in a fridge with a standalone freezer. This allows you to turn leftovers into sauces, compotes and more for later use, saving you a lot of money over time.
The style of your refrigerator is another important consideration, especially regarding storage and accessibility. Top-freezer refrigerators are the most affordable and typically have a freezer on the bottom and a fridge on the top, making them a popular choice for many kitchens. Side-by-side refrigerators are more customizable and offer a wider interior space, ideal for viewing their most frequently used items from an eye-level position.
Finally, look for models with fewer doors, as this can minimize air leakage and help you save even more on your electric bill. It‚Äôs also worth noting that the type of refrigerant a refrigerator uses can impact your energy savings. Consider looking for refrigerators that use low Global Warming Potential (GWP) refrigerants, as these have a less negative environmental impact.
Storage
A refrigerator keeps food cool, slowing bacterial growth and spoilage. This reduces the need to throw away foods that would otherwise rot, which helps save money and resources. It also helps reduce food waste, which contributes to climate change. Refrigerators are among the biggest energy consumers in the home, but proper maintenance can help them run more efficiently.
When choosing a refrigerator, consider your household size and whether you have space for multiple refrigerators. The larger a fridge is, the more energy it uses. Look for a model that is the right size and avoid side-by-side fridges, which could be more efficient. Classic top and bottom fridges are more
energy-efficient than French door models.
Storing foods in the correct order can further increase efficiency. Foods that require the lowest internal cooking temperature should be held first, followed by those that require the highest. This can prevent foods that need to be cooked quickly from overcooking and becoming mushy before they are ready to eat.
A refrigerator is one of the largest, most expensive appliances you own, so taking care of it is important. If you need to store your refrigerator temporarily, ensure its properly ventilated to prevent mold and mildew buildup. You can also use a natural cleaning solution from cheap vodka to disinfect your refrigerator without the harsh chemicals in store-bought cleaners.

author: archyworldyscom
title: A new attack on migrants
text:
MIAMI (EFE).- Former US president and Republican candidate Donald Trump attacked undocumented migrants again yesterday during an election rally in the key state of Wisconsin , where he said ‚Äúhorrible people‚Äù are crossing the border United States.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs an invasion of wild criminals,‚Äù said the tycoon at an event held in the town of Juneau, with just over 2,000 inhabitants and located in Dodge County, a rural area in southern Wisconsin, one of the seven states that will decide the situation. elections.
Trump criticized President Biden ‚Äòs administration, as well as Vice President Kamala Harris and her rival in future elections, for their handling of the southern border, and reiterated his promise to carry out ‚Äúthe largest deportation ever in the country‚Äù if it arrives at the White House.
Trump not only raised the thorny issue of immigration during the nearly two-hour rally in this state, where, after winning the 2016 election by less than 23,000 votes, he failed to repeat the victory four years later, falling against Biden in 2020 by 21,000 votes. votes.
The former Republican president yesterday again criticized the federal response to the populations affected by Hurricane ‚ÄúHelene‚Äù, which after entering north-west Florida on September 26, caused more than 230 deaths and extensive damage in six southern states -east of the country.
Trump echoed statements on social media that suggest the government is not helping those affected because it has spent its funds to help migrants.
Related
#attack #migrants

author: @multiplayerit
title: Amazon Ocelot √® un nuovo chip per il calcolo quantistico super efficiente nella correzione degli errori
text:
Amazon Web Services (AWS) ha annunciato un nuovo chip chiamato Ocelot, progettato per ridurre i costi di implementazione della correzione degli errori quantistici fino al 90%. Gli errori nel calcolo quantistico sono una delle maggiori sfide del settore, poich√© i qubit, l'unit√† di base del calcolo quantistico, sono sensibili a minime variazioni nell'ambiente.
A differenza di Google e Microsoft, che stanno cercando di ridurre gli errori aggiungendo pi√π qubit, Amazon ha integrato la correzione degli errori nel suo chip Ocelot con quelli che chiama "qubit gatto" (dal nome dell'esperimento del gatto di Schr√∂dinger). Questi qubit dovrebbero ridurre la quantit√† di energia e risorse utilizzate per la correzione degli errori quantistici poich√© "sopprimono intrinsecamente" certi tipi di errori.
L'approccio di Amazon
A differenza dei computer tradizionali, il calcolo quantistico sostituisce gli 1 e gli 0 binari con i qubit, un'unit√† che pu√≤ esistere in pi√π stati contemporaneamente. Come notato da Amazon, i qubit sono "sensibili ai minimi cambiamenti, o 'rumori' nel loro ambiente", come vibrazioni, calore e interferenze elettromagnetiche, rendendo "estremamente difficile costruire computer quantistici in grado di eseguire calcoli affidabili e senza errori di qualsiasi complessit√† significativa".
L'approccio di Amazon con i "qubit gatto" √® diverso da ci√≤ che Google e Microsoft stanno facendo per ridurre gli errori nel calcolo quantistico. Il chip di calcolo quantistico Willow di Google pare sia in grado di eseguire una sfida di calcolo in meno di cinque minuti. I ricercatori dell'azienda hanno anche scoperto che l'introduzione di pi√π qubit nel sistema pu√≤ aiutare a ridurre gli errori. Nel frattempo, Microsoft ha recentemente annunciato il suo
processore di calcolo quantistico Majorana 1, che afferma possa "scalare fino a un milione di qubit su un singolo chip" riducendo al contempo gli errori.
Amazon, integrando la correzione degli errori direttamente nel chip, potrebbe realizzare computer quantistici pi√π piccoli e pi√π efficienti. Il chip Ocelot √® ancora un prototipo, ma rappresenta un passo avanti promettente nel campo del calcolo quantistico.

author: Judit Pellicer
title: Puigdemont celebra el retorn dels exiliats per Tsunami i alerta que encara no hi ha normalitat pol√≠tica
text:
Carles Puigdemont s'ha sumat a les mostres d'alegria per la tornada dels exiliats a Su√Øssa pel cas contra Tsunami Democr√†tic. Mentre Marta Rovira, secretaria general d'ERC, Ruben Wagensberg, diputada rep√∫blica, Jes√∫s Rodr√≠guez, periodista. Josep Campmaj√≥, vicepresident d'√ímnium, tornaven a territori catal√†, les xarxes s'omplien de mostres de suport. "Ben tornats a casa!", ha iniciat Puigdemont el seu tuit, on tamb√© recorda que malgrat el retorn d'aquests exiliats, l'Estat espanyols encara est√† lluny de la normalitat pol√≠tica.
üî¥
Marta Rovira i la resta d'exiliats a Su√Øssa ja s√≥n a Catalunya | DIRECTE
"Amb exiliats, empresonats i perseguits no es pot fer pol√≠tica en igualtat de condicions. Aix√≤ afecta la democr√†cia, i mentre duri la repressi√≥ pol√≠tica no existir√† cap normalitat possible", ha subratllat i ha afegit: "Amb el retorn dels exiliats perseguits per la gran farsa judicial que ha estat el cas Tsunami s'acaba una injust√≠cia, i √©s una gran alegria en termes personals i familiars. Per√≤ encara som lluny de tenir les condicions que ens permetin fer pol√≠tica amb la normalitat".
Puigdemont ha concl√≤s el seu post a Twitter (ara X), desitjant: "Que d'alguna manera pugueu recuperar els anys i els mesos que us han robat, i que ens posem a la feina el m√©s aviat possible. Perqu√® n'hi ha molta de pendent."
Ben tornats a casa!‚Äî krls.eth / Carles Puigdemont (@KRLS)
Amb exiliats, empresonats i perseguits no es pot fer pol√≠tica en igualtat de condicions. Aix√≤ afecta la democr√†cia, i mentre duri la repressi√≥ pol√≠tica no existir√† cap normalitat possible.
Amb el retorn dels exiliats perseguits per la gran farsa judicial que‚Ä¶
 [July 12, 2024]
El retorn des de Su√Øssa
A les 8:25 d'aquest divendres, Rovira, Wagensberg, Rodr√≠guez i Campmaj√≥ han travessat la frontera que separa l'Estat espanyol i el franc√®s. D'aquesta manera els exiliats pel cas Tsunami Democr√†tic han tornat a Catalunya despr√©s que el cas fos arxivat. Els cinc retornats han fet una parada simb√≤lica abans de travessar la frontera administrativa i s‚Äôhan despla√ßat fins a la Porta dels Pa√Øsos Catalans, a Salses. All√† els esperaven destacats noms de la pol√≠tica catalana com Jordi Turull i Josep Rius (Junts); Teresa Jord√†, David Mascort i Laia Ca√±igueral (ERC); Montserrat Vinyets, David Fern√°ndez, Anna Gabriel i Carles Riera (CUP); el president d‚Äô√ímnium Xavier Antich; l‚Äôadvocat Benet Salellas; el tamb√© encara exiliat i diputat de Junts, Llu√≠s Puig; i membres dels grups de suport a Jes√∫s Rodr√≠guez i a la resta d‚Äôexiliats. A m√©s, una trentena d‚Äôamics, companys i coneguts han acudit tamb√© a aquesta simb√≤lica trobada del mat√≠, pas previ a entrar al Principat.
ElNacional.cat a WhatsApp, hi trobar√†s tota l'actualitat, en un clic!

author: Petty Officer 1st Class Austin Ingram
title: Career Day Presentation (NMCB 3) [Image 2 of 4]
text:
240605-N-VH871-1350 RESEDA, Calif. (Jun. 5th, 2024) ‚Äì Gunner‚Äôs Mate 1st Class Sergey Kalashnikov, left, Religious Program Specialist 1st Class Vinny R. Burkett, center, and Builder 1st Class Jose Raygoza, assigned to Naval Mobile Construction Battalion (NMCB) 3, talk about what they do in the Navy during Career Day at Newcastle Elementary School. NMCB 3 is homeported out of Port Hueneme, training on high-quality construction, expeditionary logistics, and combat operations to execute construction and engineering projects for major combat operations, disaster response, and humanitarian assistance. (U.S. Navy photo by Mass Communication Specialist 1st Class Austin Ingram)

author: Jos√© Alfredo Espinal
title: Por segundo a√±o, Abel otorga sueldo 14 a los empleados del cabildo
text:
Por segundo a√±o consecutivo, el ayuntamiento otorg√≥ ayer el sueldo 14 a los servidores municipales, un incentivo que el alcalde
Abel Mart√≠nez considera da una oportunidad adicional a la empleoman√≠a de hacer mejoras en sus viviendas o disfrutarlo con la familia.
La disposici√≥n del alcalde beneficia de manera directa a 2,795 empleados que prestan servicio en los diferentes departamentos del cabildo, a excepci√≥n del principal ejecutivo de la ciudad, que opt√≥ por excluirse de recibirlo.
Puede leer:
Aeropuerto del Cibao alcanza los 2 millones de pasajeros
El cabildo explic√≥ que el incentivo es producto de la eficiente gesti√≥n administrativa, que adem√°s de construir cientos de obras ha logrado un ejercicio transparente de los recursos, certificado por la Direcci√≥n General de √âtica e Integridad Gubernamental, (DGEIG) y otros organismos.
El aliciente econ√≥mico del salario 14 representa para la instituci√≥n una erogaci√≥n de unos RD$23 millones, unos recursos que se entregan en adici√≥n a la regal√≠a pascual o sueldo trece que recibieron el pasado 1 de diciembre, adem√°s del salario regular del mes de diciembre, que tambi√©n fue pagado antes de la Nochebuena.
El ayuntamiento record√≥ que en los dos per√≠odos del alcalde Abel Mart√≠nez no se han contra√≠do deudas por pr√©stamos bancarios, manteniendo al d√≠a el pago mensual a la empleoman√≠a, a suplidores y contratistas de las m√°s de 550 obras que han impactado positivamente al municipio.
El alcalde Abel Mart√≠nez, aprovech√≥ una vez m√°s para agradecer la entrega y el sacrificio por parte de la empleoman√≠a que le acompa√±a durante su gesti√≥n municipal, a la que dese√≥ una Feliz Navidad y un pr√≥spero a√±o 2024.

author: ANI
title: Rahul Gandhi, Kharge extend wishes of love, compassion on Good Friday | Headlines
text: Rahul Gandhi, Kharge extend wishes of love, compassion on Good Friday Congress leaders Rahul Gandhi and Mallikarjun Kharge have urged people to imbibe the spirit of humanity, kindness, and peace and wished that Good Friday enriches their lives with love and enlightens their path with compassion [ANI](/ani-stories)| Updated: 29-03-2024 19:56 IST | Created: 29-03-2024 19:56 IST - Country: - India Congress leaders Rahul Gandhi and Mallikarjun Kharge have urged people to imbibe the spirit of humanity, kindness, and peace and wished that Good Friday enriches their lives with love and enlightens their path with compassion. "May this Good Friday enrich your lives with love and enlighten your path with compassion and kindness," Rahul Gandhi said in a post on X. Congress president Kharge wished that the spirit of compassion, forgiveness, sacrifice and empathy guides people. "Wishing you all a blessed Good Friday. May the spirit of compassion, forgiveness, sacrifice and empathy keep guiding our path. Let us imbibe the spirit of humanity, kindness, and peace, amongst us," Kharge said in a post on X. Congress MP Shashi Tharoor, who offered Good Friday prayers at Saint Joseph's Cathedral in Palayam, Thiruvananthapuram, said he has the opportunity to show respect for all traditions, all beliefs. "I have also been going for Iftars to various masjids across my constituency. Vishu, which is the Hindu New Year in Kerala, is coming up before the elections. This is an unusual occurrence when all three important events coincide with the election campaigning period," he said. "As a result, it gives us the opportunity to show my respect for all traditions, all beliefs and all people in our constituency and that is what I have been doing," he added. Prime Minister Narendra Modi recalled the sacrifice of Jesus Christ on the occasion of Good Friday and said it teaches people compassion and forgiveness. "Today, on Good Friday, we remember the profound sacrifice of Jesus Christ. May everyone find strength in the lessons of compassion and forgiveness it teaches us," PM Modi said in a post on X. The solemn occasion of Good Friday was marked by prayers in different parts of the country. Good Friday commemorates the crucifixion of Jesus Christ and his death at Calvary. It marks the beginning of the Easter weekend. (ANI) (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)
